segments.text: Do you mind if I open the window ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you don't mind , I'd rather you didn't . I have a cold and feel chilly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that's too bad . Should I call a doctor ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd appreciate it if you would .
segments.speaker: S2
